name: Hungry Nemo
description:
Nemo's main thought is in how to grow up!
Different fish kinds are attacking him, so you have to help him to attack first! By eating smaller fishes he is getting bigger and bigger.

As Nemo grows, he starts to eat sharks and gradually gets on a good mood. Remember that every fish is a fisher & survives the stronger!

- Astonishing physics and challenging gameplay – To make the game very entertaining!
- Fish characters - Initially have been drawn with pencil to comply with the amazing game idea!
- Music - composed specially for this game!
- Amazing fish control - With accelerometer and/or Joystick!
- Built-in store - To make your play more entertaining!

*** Control Nemo by swinging your iPhone /iPod Touch/iPad ***

Game is super entertaining and challenging! You'll play it continuously without a rest!
No words about how proud you'll be seeing that NEMO is getting bigger and bigger by eating bigger and bigger fishes and sharks!

If you like "Hungry Nemo", please rate us on AppStore. It motivates Nemo to grow bigger and bigger.
We look forward to your feedback, which motivates us a lot.

Thanks!
